mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from TBL_ORDER order by ordercode desc, productcode asc) tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}

select count(*) from TBL_ORDER where
productName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
userID like #{searchText}
and
orderdate >= to_date(#{dateText1},'YYYYMMDD') and orderdate < to_date(#{dateText2},'YYYYMMDD') + 1
